## config
### /config.config/groups
//get all groups
#### Req:
```
Method:       POST
Content-Type: application/json
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	"search_filter":"str"
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
#### Resp:
```
Fail:    httpcode:4xx/5xx
{"code":123,"msg":"error message"}
Success: httpcode:200
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	"groups":["str","str"]
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```

### /config.config/updatecipher
//update one specific app's cipher
#### Req:
```
Method:       POST
Content-Type: application/json
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	//value length must > 0
	"groupname":"str",
	//value length must > 0
	"appname":"str",
	"old":"str",
	//empty means stop cipher
	"new":"str"
}

```

### /config.config/get
//get one specific app's config
#### Req:
```
Method:       POST
Content-Type: application/json
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	//value length must > 0
	"groupname":"str",
	//value length must > 0
	"appname":"str",
	//0 means return current active config,config's index start from 1
	//uint32
	"index":0
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
#### Resp:
```
Fail:    httpcode:4xx/5xx
{"code":123,"msg":"error message"}
Success: httpcode:200
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	//current active config index,0 means not exist
	//uint32
	"cur_index":0,
	//current max config index,0 means not exist
	//uint32
	"max_index":0,
	//current active config version,config's version start from 1
	//uint32
	"cur_version":0,
	//the config data below belong's to which index
	//uint32
	"this_index":0,
	"app_config":"str",
	"source_config":"str"
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```

### /config.config/watch
//watch on specific app's config
#### Req:
```
Method:       POST
Content-Type: application/json
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	//value length must > 0
	"groupname":"str",
	//value length must > 0
	"appname":"str",
	//<0 means return current active config,if cur_version is the newest,the request will block until a new version come
	//int32
	"cur_version":0
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
#### Resp:
```
Fail:    httpcode:4xx/5xx
{"code":123,"msg":"error message"}
Success: httpcode:200
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	"app_config":"str",
	"source_config":"str",
	//int32
	"version":0
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
